'''Hersent''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Age of Discovery]].
document_data.History: Hersent developed two spells during their life. The spells they invented were ''[[sepia snake sigil]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2749|NY}} and ''[[symbol]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2850|NY}}.
